channel.description: Recent content in Discrete Optimization on bnmoch3

item.title: Guided Local Search for the Capacitated Facility Location Problem
item.description: Overview of Guided Local Search plus how it can be applied to the capacitated facility location problem.

item.title: Minizinc: Alternative Modeling Approaches for the Facility Location Problem
item.description: Multiple views and Channeling Constraints make for faster models (in some cases)

item.title: The Facility Location Problem
item.description: Discrete Optimization: Where to construct facilities so as to minimize setup costs and customer servicing costs while ensuring each facility is able to meet customer demands.
